ca.uqac.lif.cep

Class Palette

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.uqac.lif.cep.Palette
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    BootstrapGrammar, CliGrammar, EplGrammar, IoPalette, NumberGrammar, StreamGrammar, TupleGrammar

    public abstract class Palette
extends Object
    Provides extensions to the original parser's grammar

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  Palette.PaletteEntry
      Represents one of the processors provided by this palette.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected Class<? extends Palette> m_classReference
      A reference to the current class of grammar extension.
      protected List<Palette.PaletteEntry> m_entries
      The list of entries in this palette
      protected int m_id
      The ID for this palette
      protected String m_message
      The message used to describe this palette
      protected static String s_associationsFilename
      The (local) filename containing the associations between non-terminal symbols of the grammar and classes defined in that extension of the grammar
      protected static String s_commentChar
      The character used for comments in the associations file
      protected static String s_grammarFilename
      The (local) filename containing the BNF grammar to extend the interpreter's basic grammar
      protected static int s_idCounter
      A counter for palette IDs

        protected static final transient String s_commentChar
        The character used for comments in the associations file

      • m_message

        protected String m_message
        The message used to describe this palette

      • m_classReference

        protected final Class<? extends Palette> m_classReference
        A reference to the current class of grammar extension. This is necessary because the methods getAssociations() and getGrammar() must read a file whose path is relative to that class, and not the Palette class.

      • m_entries

        protected List<Palette.PaletteEntry> m_entries
        The list of entries in this palette

        Produces a message (e.g. copyright info, authors, etc.) associated to the grammar extension
